solution_line_template: The bus started with {initial_people_on_bus} people - {people_off_first_stop} who got off at the first stop = <<{initial_people_on_bus}-{people_off_first_stop}={people_after_first_stop}>>{people_after_first_stop} people on the bus.

At the second stop, {people_after_first_stop} people on the bus - {people_off_second_stop} who got off = <<{people_after_first_stop}-{people_off_second_stop}={people_after_second_off}>>{people_after_second_off} people.

Then there were {people_after_second_off} people + {people_on_second_stop} who got on = <<{people_after_second_off}+{people_on_second_stop}={people_after_second_stop}>>{people_after_second_stop} people on the bus.

At the third stop, {people_after_second_stop} people on the bus - {people_off_third_stop} who got off = <<{people_after_second_stop}-{people_off_third_stop}={people_after_third_off}>>{people_after_third_off} people on the bus.

Then there were {people_after_third_off} people on the bus + {people_on_third_stop} who got on = <<{people_after_third_off}+{people_on_third_stop}={final_people_on_bus}>>{final_people_on_bus} people on the bus.
